reference_a:
@article{menghini2023,
  title = {Workplace stress in real time},
  author = {Menghini, Luca and Pastore, Massimiliano and Balducci, Cristian},
  date = {2023},
  journaltitle = {European Journal of Psychological Assessment},
  volume = {39},
  number = {6},
  pages = {424--432},
  publisher = {Hogrefe Publishing},
  issn = {1015-5759},
  doi = {10.1027/1015-5759/a000725}
}

features.name: os
features.coding: iOS or Android
features.details: iOS or Android

features.name: day_of_week
features.coding:
1 = Monday
3 = Wednesday
5 = Friday
features.details:
1 = Monday
3 = Wednesday
5 = Friday

features.name: survey_type
features.coding: Baseline or work
features.details: Baseline or work

features.name: run_timestamp
features.coding: Initiation time of questionnair
features.details: Initiation time of questionnair

features.name: submission_timestamp
features.coding: Submission time of questionnair
features.details: Submission time of questionnair

features.name: well
features.coding:
How do you feel at this moment? 
1 = Very unwell
7 = Very well
features.details: How do you feel at this moment?

features.name: discontent
features.coding:
How do you feel at this moment? 
1 = Very content
7 = Very discontent
features.details: How do you feel at this moment?

features.name: state
features.coding:
How do you feel at this moment? 
1 = In a very negative
7 = In a very positive state
features.details: How do you feel at this moment?
features.labels:
1 = In a very negative
7 = In a very positive state

features.name: tense
features.coding:
How do you feel at this moment? 
1 = Very relaxed
7 = Very tense
features.details: How do you feel at this moment?
features.construct: tense, negative affect, affect, neuroticism, big five

features.name: calm
features.coding:
How do you feel at this moment? 
1 = Very agitated
7 = Very calm
features.details: How do you feel at this moment?
features.construct: calmness, positive affect, affect, neuroticism, big five

features.name: placid
features.coding:
How do you feel at this moment? 
1 = Very nervous
7 = Very placid
features.details: How do you feel at this moment?
features.construct: calmness, positive affect, affect, neuroticism, big five

features.name: awake
features.coding:
How do you feel at this moment? 
1 = Very tired
7 = Very awake
features.details: How do you feel at this moment?

features.name: energyless
features.coding:
How do you feel at this moment? 
1 = Very full of energy
7 = Very without energy
features.details: How do you feel at this moment?
features.labels:
1 = Very full of energy
7 = Very without energy
features.construct: energy, negative affect, affect, big five, extraversion

features.name: rested
features.coding:
How do you feel at this moment? 
1 = Very fatigued
7 = Very rested
features.details: How do you feel at this moment?
features.construct: feeling rested, fatigue, positive affect, affect

features.name: what
features.coding:
Think about the main work activity performed in the last 10 minutes. What kind of activity was it?

(long list of potential responses)
features.details: Think about the main work activity performed in the last 10 minutes. What kind of activity was it?

features.name: how
features.coding:
How were you doing the work activity?
Face-to-face
On the computer
Videocall (e.g., Skype)
Smartphone/table
On the phone
With paper documents
Other
features.details: How were you doing the work activity?
features.labels:
Face-to-face
On the computer
Videocall (e.g., Skype)
Smartphone/table
On the phone
With paper documents
Other

features.name: whom
features.coding:
Who was doing the activity with you?
Anyone
Coworkers
Supervisors
Subordinates
Customers/users
Suppliers/external collaborators
Family members/friends
Other
features.details: Who was doing the activity with you?
features.labels:
Anyone
Coworkers
Supervisors
Subordinates
Customers/users
Suppliers/external collaborators
Family members/friends
Other
features.construct: work task, work, social interaction, colleagues, context

features.name: n_people
features.coding: How many people were present, aside from you?
features.details: How many people were present, aside from you?

features.name: too_much
features.coding:
In relation with the work activity, I had to do too much
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
features.details: In relation with the work activity, I had to do too much

features.name: work_fast
features.coding:
In relation with the work activity, the activity required me to work very fast
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
features.details: In relation with the work activity, the activity required me to work very fast

features.name: multitasking
features.coding:
In relation with the work activity, I did multiple things at once
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
features.details: In relation with the work activity, I did multiple things at once

features.name: hard_work
features.coding:
In relation with the work activity, I had to work very hard
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
features.details: In relation with the work activity, I had to work very hard

features.name: change_task
features.coding:
I could change task if I chose to 
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
features.details: I could change task if I chose to
features.source: Diary for the Ambulatory Behavioral States

features.name: decide_task
features.coding:
I could decide how to perform the task
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
features.details: I could decide how to perform the task
features.source: Diary for the Ambulatory Behavioral States

features.name: schedule_task
features.coding:
I could schedule the time of the task
1 = Not at all
7 = Very much
features.details: I could schedule the time of the task
features.source: Diary for the Ambulatory Behavioral States
